episodes.title: Bristrol Amitabha Kadampa Centre
episodes.description: Tibetans with Locals and some former members of NKT counter-protested at Kadampa Centre in Bristol, UK.

episodes.title: (part 4) Unearthing Kelsang Gyatso's Lie by Geshe Tashi
episodes.description: Kelsang Gyatso, founder of New Kadampa Tradition, claims that he never received any teachings from the Dalai Lama. Here, Geshe Tashi exposes the broken samaya.

episodes.title: (part 3) Geshe Tashi clears Kelsang Gyatso's distortion of four Kadampa dieties
episodes.description: This is part 3 of many to follow. Geshe Tashi Tsering explains what Kadampa is and the four Kadampa deities which Kelsang Gyatso distorted and replaced Miyowa to Shugden worshiped by New Kadampa Tradition in the West. This is an education for the general public particularly those supposed Buddhist ordained monks and nuns of New Kadampa Tradition.

episodes.title: Andrea speaks her experience and ordination in NKT
episodes.description: Andrea Ballance is a ex-member of New Kadampa Tradition (NKT). She speaks about her experiences and ordination in NKT. This is an education to the general public about so called New Kadampa Tradition - a false Buddhist organisation defaming His Holiness the Dalai Lama in the name of religious freedom.

episodes.title: Amanda appeals NKT members to stop their protest
episodes.description: Amanda Zinski is a ex-member of New Kadampa Tradition (NKT). She appeals to NKT followers to stop their protest agains the Dalai Lama and the Tibetan people. This is an education to the general public about so called New Kadampa Tradition - a false Buddhist organisation defaming His Holiness the Dalai Lama in the name of religious freedom.

episodes.title: (part 2) Geshe Tashi challenges NKT Buddhist ordination rite
episodes.description: This is part 2 of many to follow. Geshe Tashi explains what went wrong with NKT Buddhist ordination system and how Kelsang Gyatso misinterpreted the teachings of Tsongkhapa and Atisha regarding ordination. This is an education for the general public particularly those supposed Buddhist ordained monks and nuns of New Kadampa Tradition.

episodes.title: (part 1) Geshe Tashi explains Buddhist ordination rite
episodes.description: This is part 1 of many to follow. Geshe Tashi explains the Buddhist ordination rite for the general public particularly for the people in NKT under Kelsang Gyatso to be aware of whether they have received actual ordination or nothing but a false ordination.

episodes.title: Andy Durling speaks his experiences in NKT
episodes.description: Andy Durling speaks out his many years of experience in the New Kadampa Tradition (NKT). This is an education to the general public about so called New Kadampa Tradition - a false Buddhist organisation defaming His Holiness the Dalai Lama in the name of religious freedom.

episodes.title: Carol McQuire speaks on Shugden Protesters
episodes.description: Carol speaks out her difficult experiences in New Kadampa Tradition set up by Kalsang Gyatso in the West to protest against the Dalai Lama. This is a education to the general public about so called New Kadampa Tradition - a false Buddhist organisation defaming His Holiness the Dalai Lama in the name of religious freedom.
